superserver module

superserver.is_json(myjson)
class superserver.superServer(host)

Bases: object

This is the super-server class, using this , we do the load-balancing in case of multiple servers

Parameters

  • supersocket (socket) – accepts connections from the server

  • clientsocket (socket) – accepts connections from the clients

  • server (list) – list of connections to the server

  • client (list) – list of connections to the client

__init__(host)

Constructor method, initializes everything

Parameters

host (string) – address of the host

accept_client()

Accepts connections from the clients and connects them to the server which is connected to the least number of clients(round-robin) doing the load balancing

accept_server()

Accepts connections from the servers and receives and sends messages to servers

handle_recv(connection, id)

Receives and sends messages to servers

Parameters

  • connection (socket) – The connection from which it receives this message

  • id (int) – The server id from which it received the message
